item.description:

{
Class9 t = aClass9Array210[1644];

public static void EquipmentScreen(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid) { Class9 class9 = addTab(15106); Class9 class9 = addTab(15101); Class9 class9 = addTab(15102); /*addInterfaceSprite(ID, SpriteON, SpriteOFF, "Sprite")*/ addInterfaceSprite(15107, 15107, 15107, "Sprite"); /*addActionButton(ID, SpriteON, SpriteOFF, SpriteX, SpriteY, "SpriteText");*/ addActionButton(15108, 15108, 15108, 21, 21, "Close");

class9.anIntArray240[0] = 15107;//window class9.anIntArray241[0] = 4; class9.anIntArray272[0] = 20; class9.anIntArray240[1] = 15108;//close class9.anIntArray241[1] = 476; class9.anIntArray272[1] = 21-5+13; class9.anIntArray240[2] = 15109;//equip your character... class9.anIntArray241[2] = 3 + 11; class9.anIntArray272[2] = 22-5+13;

Sombody ? Any Idea?
